summary:
simply splits draugr armor into pieces.
STANDALONE Female Only
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#6aa84f]DESCRIPTION
[/color][/font][/center]

Description:
Draugr armor divided into parts.
FEMALE ONLY

Inspired by this mod,please take a look at that if you like armor parts :) :
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22168/?]UNP - Hmm What To Wear[/url]

[center][color=#6aa84f]________________INFORMATIONS!!!!!_____________[/color][/center]
-it can be crafted at a forge under iron category.

also you can spawn a chest with console, help "zzdraugr"

-pieces are made for UNP body,but they will work even with vanilla and cbbe (there may be some clippings on the torso parts)

credits:
bethesda
dimon99 for unp body:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/?

author: zzjay
